item.title: High schools in Ohio will vote in special election next month to allow NIL for athletes
item.description: High school principals in Ohio will vote on an emergency bylaw referendum about Name, Image, and Likeness regulations next month

item.title: Trump issues disaster declarations for Alaska and other states but denies Illinois and Maryland
item.description: President Donald Trump has approved major disaster declarations for Alaska, Nebraska, North Dakota and the Leech Lake Band of Ojibwe

item.title: 4 family members of Illinois governor candidate killed in Montana helicopter crash
item.description: Four family members of a Republican running for governor in Illinois have died in a helicopter crash in Montana

item.title: States worry about how to fill the gap in food aid ahead of a federal benefits halt
item.description: A federal food aid program that helps about one in eight Americans buy groceries stands to be paused Nov. 1 because of the government shutdown

item.title: What lawmakers are saying about Trump's demolition of the East Wing
item.description: Members of Congress are divided largely along party lines on the demolition of the East Wing of the White House to make room for a 90,000-square-foot ...
